name: Island Isolate
description:
Hey! This is my first game, made for the game jam "Isolation".

You control a spaceship, which has been infected by a computer virus, forcing it to fly on a nearby planet, looking for spots to repair.

Additional viruses track the spaceship and try to infect it completely.

Go to the islands and land on them to isolate yourself from the virus and repair your ship. Don’t land on the water, or you will drown.

Pickups spawn randomly near rocks. Find and collect them.

Shooting down viruses, staying isolated on an island and getting pickups increase your score.

Controls: W, A, S, D to move, MOUSE to rotate and SPACEBAR to land (hopefully on an island).
